lines.text: Group W is where they putcha if you may not be moral enough to join the army after committin' your special crime. There was all kinds of mean, nasty ugly-lookin' people on the bench there. There was mother rapers... father stabbers... father rapers... Father rapers! Sittin' right there on the bench next to me!
Want your wallets and your belts. Put everything on the desk.
I can understand you wanting our wallets, so we don't have any money to spend in the cell, but what do you want our belts for?
Kid, we don't want any hanging.

[pause]
Obie, do you think we're gonna hang ourselves for littering?
Take off those handcuffs!
You're interfering in the performance of my duties.
You're a meathead - haven't you play-acted cop enough for one day?
This side is reserved for officers of the law and criminals.
Pig-eyed idiot!
Alice, I've had enough garbage for one day, yours and theirs.
Stupid bastard!
Alice...
Cradle hopper!
Alice!
Turkey raper!
Girdles feel funny.

[approaching Arlo on the bench]
Kid, what'd you get?
I didn't get nothin'. I had to pay fifty dollars, and pick up the garbage.

[as Arlo leads donkey into the church]
You can ride him to Canada!

[about to be drafted]
Been wondering how to get my ass across the border.
Just what I've always wanted.
A restaurant?
No, a friend with a restaurant.
Obie, when do we get our bread and water?
Shut up, kid.
What funny smell?
[covering up the weed box]

[unable to fill his urine-sample jar, at his Army physical]
Anybody got some to spare?
